name: grassroots
description: Political Campaign Software focused on voter outreach and volunteer management.

scripts.start: concurrently "pnpm --filter grassroots-frontend run start " "pnpm --filter grassroots-backend run start"
scripts.test: pnpm --filter grassroots-frontend run test && pnpm --filter grassroots-backend run test && pnpm --filter eslint_rules run test
scripts.check: pnpm exec tsc --noEmit --project grassroots-frontend && pnpm exec tsc --noEmit --project grassroots-backend && pnpm exec tsc --noEmit --project eslint_rules && pnpm exec eslint .
